cardinal.name: Cardinal
cardinal.unlock: > Acquired by defeating the beefy Brute in Industrial Castle.
cardinal.effect: > Finds five secret items, from Forest Entrance, Thieves' Forest, Industrial Castle, Marsh, and Full Moon.

owlet.name: Owlet
owlet.unlock: > Found behind the bush in Forest Entrance, with a music note effect.

rammy.name: Rammy
rammy.unlock: > Acquired by defeating the Bear boss in Tall Grass Field.
rammy.effect: > Occasionally knocks enemies into the air, dealing minimal damage and knocking them down.

frogglet.name: Frogglet
frogglet.unlock: > Found in a dig spot in Marsh, in the graveyard.
frogglet.effect: > Picks up items from far away.

monkeyface.name: Monkeyface
monkeyface.unlock: > Bought in Church Store for 325 gold.
monkeyface.effect: > Boosts enemy drop rates by approximately 3x.

bipolar_bear.name: BiPolar Bear
bipolar_bear.unlock: > Acquired by using the horn at the end of Snow World.
bipolar_bear.effect:
> Mauls enemies with 8% or less health.
> Mauls friendlies with 11 or less health.

bitey_bat.name: Bitey Bat
bitey_bat.unlock: > Acquired by defeating Pipistrello in Pipistrello's Cave.
bitey_bat.effect: > Occasionally holds enemies in place, dealing minimal damage.

yeti.name: Yeti
yeti.unlock: > Found behind the last house in Snow World.
yeti.effect:
> Grants the player immunity to freezing.
> Reduces the damage from freezing attacks.

troll.name: Troll
troll.unlock: > Acquired by using three bombs on the wall in the ruins in Thieves' Forest.
troll.effect: > Regenerates 1% of the player's HP every 10 seconds.

snailburt.name: Snailburt
snailburt.unlock: > Found by the outhouse in Marsh.

giraffey.name: Giraffey
giraffey.unlock: > Found in a dig spot in Desert, between two slabs.
giraffey.effect: > Gives a 10% XP multiplier to the player.

zebra.name: Zebra
zebra.unlock: > Acquired by defeating the non-aggressive Saracen in Desert Chase.
zebra.effect: > When equipped, all grass drops fruit unless the grass is broken by a splash attack.

meowburt.name: Meowburt
meowburt.unlock: > Found by leaving the entrance of Cyclops' Cave.

pazzo.name: Pazzo
pazzo.unlock: > Bought in Snow Store for 445 gold.
pazzo.effect: > Reveals digspots by hovering over them.

burly_bear.name: Burly Bear
burly_bear.unlock: > Acquired by using a sandwich on the rock in Tall Grass Field, then using a bomb on the wall.

hawkster.name: Hawkster
hawkster.unlock: > Acquired by using the horn after the first wave of enemies in Tall Grass Field.
hawkster.effect:
> Pecks knocked down enemies for 1 HP per hit.
> Retrieves fruit from dead enemies unless particular circumstances are met.

snoot.name: Snoot
snoot.unlock: > Acquired by using three bombs on the cracked wall in Cyclops' Fortress.

piggy.name: Piggy
piggy.unlock: > Bought in Swamp Village Store for 290 gold.
piggy.effect: > When equipped, food heals for 2x health.

spiny.name: Spiny
spiny.unlock: > Bought in Volcano Store for 300 gold.

scratchpaw.name: Scratchpaw
scratchpaw.unlock: > Acquired by using two bombs on the cracked wall in Sand Castle Interior.

seahorse.name: Seahorse
seahorse.unlock: > Found next to the river in Thieves' Forest.
seahorse.effect: > Allows for normal movement in water.

chicken.name: Chicken
chicken.unlock: > Found in a dig spot in Medusa's Lair, before the water.

install_ball.name: Install Ball
install_ball.unlock: > Found behind a door in Alien Ship, after the countdown starts.
install_ball.effect: > Occasionally shoots enemies with a projectile, dealing 4 damage per hit.

mr_buddy.name: Mr. Buddy
mr_buddy.unlock: > Found in a dig spot in Barracks, before the stairs.

sherbert.name: Sherbert
sherbert.unlock: > Found in the upper left corner of Animal Ark.

pelter.name: Pelter
pelter.unlock: > Bought in Insane Store for 1100 gold.
pelter.effect: > Occasionally shoots enemies with a snowball. Damage is based on the player's magic damage.

dragonhead.name: Dragonhead
dragonhead.unlock: > Bought in Insane Store for 1100 gold.
dragonhead.effect: > Occasionally shoots enemies with a fireball. Damage is based on the player's magic damage.

beholder.name: Beholder
beholder.unlock: > Open the locked door in Animal Ark with the Key Sword.

golden_whale.name: Golden Whale
golden_whale.effect:
> Occasionally drops a gold piece.
> Prevents coins from being dropped.
